member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel
member.summary: The interface provides the ability to access the default MEF composition container and catalogs of Visual Studio.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel.DefaultCatalog
member.summary: Gets the default Visual Studio catalog.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel.DefaultExportProvider
member.summary: Gets the export provider of the default composition container of the Visual Studio.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel.DefaultCompositionService
member.summary: Gets the composition service of Visual Studio default composition container that allows satisfying imports of object without them being a part of the container.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel.GetCatalog(System.String)
member.summary: Provides access to a MEF catalog by name.
member.param: Name of the catalog cannot be null or an empty string.
member.exception: Thrown when catalogName argument is null.
Thrown when catalogName argument is an empty string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel.GetService``1
member.summary: Gets a "service" from the default composition container, i.e. an object of which there can only a single instance exist in a given composition container. Equals to calling directly.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to get.
member.returns: The instance of the requested object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel.GetExtensions``1
member.summary: Gets an enumeration of "extensions" from the default composition container, i.e. objects of which there can multiple instances exist in a given composition container. Equals to calling directly.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to get.
member.returns: The instance(s) of the requested object(s).

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel2
member.summary: The interface provides the ability to access the default MEF composition container and catalogs of Visual Studio.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.IComponentModel2.DefaultScopedCatalog
member.summary: Gets the default scoped Visual Studio catalog.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ComponentModelHost.SComponentModel
member.summary: The service identity of the MEF host in Visual Studio.
